author: rjmholt
body:
Failure occurs at:

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/powershell/Modules/PowerShellGet/PowerShellGet.Tests.ps1

Error is:

```
The term 'Validate-VersionParameters' is not recognized as a name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or executable program.
Check the spelling of the name, or if a path was included, verify that the path is correct and try again.
```

Recommended solution is to move to PowerShellGet v3
title: PowerShellGet tests fail on CentOS 8: 'Validate-VersionParameters' is not recognized as a name of a cmdlet
